tool_description: Validates proposed medications against patient allergies and cross-sensitivities to prevent allergic reactions.
error_messages: Invalid allergy format: Allergy entries must be properly formatted. Use standard medical terminology.
Medication not recognized: The proposed medication is not found in the database.
Allergy database error: Cannot access allergy cross-reference database. Verify system connectivity.
usage: Provide the patient_allergies array and proposed_medication. The tool will identify potential allergic reactions and cross-sensitivities.

is_safe.description: Whether the medication is safe given patient allergies

risk_level.description: Risk assessment: none, low, moderate, or high
